stanza.line: Accuse me thus that I have scanted allall
Wherein I should your great deserts repayrepay
Forgot upon your dearest love to callcall
Whereto all bonds do tie me day by dayday
That I have frequent been with unknown mindsminds
And given to time your own dear-purchased rightright
That I have hoisted sail to all the windswinds
Which should transport me farthest from your sightsight
Book both my wilfulness and errors downdown
And on just proof surmise accumulateaccumulate
Bring me within the level of your frownfrown
But shoot not at me in your wakened hatehate
Since my appeal says I did strive to proveprove
The constancy and virtue of your lovelove
